question: Global Alliance for Vaccines and Immunization (GAVI) is:
option1: a global confederation of 14 countries working together to fight chronic diseases
option2: a global health partnership of public and private sector organizations
option3: an international, independent, medical humanitarian organisation
option4: an organization mandated by the Geneva Conventions which encourages people to get vaccinated
answer: a global health partnership of public and private sector organizations
explanation: The Global Alliance for Vaccines and Immunization (GAVI) is a global health partnership of public and private sector organizations. It has been remarkably successful in revitalizing the international coalition of institutions and organizations concerned with getting vaccines to the children of the poorest countries.
